bug.author: MTeja1991
bug.summary: ValueError: Input tensors to a Functional must come from `tf.keras.Input`. Received: 0 (missing previous layer metadata).
bug.description: from tensorflow.keras import backend as K get_activations = K.function([model.layers[0].input,model.layers[1].input,model.layers[2].input,model.layers[3].input, K.learning_phase()],[model.layers[layer_idx].output,]) TF 2.3.1 Windows 10 in anaconda python 3.8 environment Got error while executing(four stream architecture) ValueError: Input tensors to a Functional must come from tf.keras.Input. Received: 0 (missing previous layer metadata).
